title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Constraint-Led Approach Design for Motor Skill Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Exercise Mechanics and Mathematical Modeling
context.additional_context: A course to strengthen exercise skill education design capabilities for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design motor skill training scenarios according to the CLA (Constraints-Led Approach) principles.
Learners can analyze constraints of motor skills using mathematical models and propose optimal learning environments.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate motor performance videos using digital tools and derive improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
